summary: Eight people are trapped on an island when their plane abandons them. They find a large mansion whose butler is expecting them. Then one by one, they die...
cast: Nanda|Manoj Kumar|Pran|Helen|Mehmood|Dhumal|Madan Puri|Tarun Bose|Manmohan|Naina|Laxmi Chhaya|Baba Benjamin|Herman Benjamin|Hiralal|Bazid Khan|Terence Lyons|Surendra Rahi|Ratna
title: Gumnaam
